text: OMG, this place is great Kristin is our waiter, well the only one here right now eight booths are full of people and he's very attentive to each customer. Best waiter I ever had in Vegas. The food is delious YAAASSSS WE WILL BE BACK. Thank you Kristin.
Ordered the French toast but it tasted more like regular bread. Very disappointing! Also, the hash browns were under cooked.

Definitely check this place out. Great food and excellent service. My steak skillet came out sizzling and was cooked perfectly. My friend ordered the Mexi Burrito and it was to die for. We'll be back!
Wow... I really luv this restaurant!!! The food is awesome. I recently retired and moved here from the EastCoast... but Ely's made me feel at home! 100% recommend to everyone!

This was our 3rd visit to Ely's and it was so very good. 
Previously I have ordered the 3 egg breakfast combo and philly burger w/fries. This time I ordered the large pozole. My big ol' bowl of pozole arrived hot and accompanied by 4 tortillas, lots of limes and a pile of cabbage.
My boyfriend is a breakfast guy and always get there 3 egg combo. He changes it up by getting a different dessert each time. This time he got the crepes with strawberry cream cheese and they were amazing. 
We had a great meal and great service (thanks to Erica) for only $22.

I have to say the ambulance is great. The restaurant is very clean the food is amazing on weekends a wonderful dish called Pozole, that is what I look forward to. Lunch is always fun and can't wait for them to open for dinner. The wait staff is always friendly and make sure your food is services hot. The prices are very reasonable.  No reservations are needed as of yet. Check them out!!!

This is the kind of place you would go to if you were back home and wanted a place where the food is great and the prices even better. It's good to get out of the glitz of Vegas and feel like you are at home. It's just a place in a strip mall but the food is great the people are very friendly and if you are a novice in the use of the Spanish language you can test your skills or just speak English.
Ely's was great!!  Service, food and atmospheres was all good. Roberto was the best!!  Mahalo (thank you)!!

Yesterday as we were driving around looking to try something new we saw this restaurant.  We decided to stop by and see what they have.  When you first walk in you can feel a great vibe and everything is so clean and organized.  Great music by the wqy. Food super fresh. I ordered their new Mexican omelet with some Pico de gallo, it was so fresh that I even ate it by it self !
My boyfriend ordered the chicken fajita omelet and he loved it !  
Everything was great and the service even better, our server named karla was always nice and generous.  I would definitely come back!

I'm not from Vegas, just visiting. Go figure right. Well to my surprise the hotel food and hotel restaurant prices where out of this world. Just ridiculously high. And with the advent of yelp and services like Lift, I chose to go elsewhere. Casting my vote with my dollars. And this little privately owned restaurant was just awesome. Great food. I had the Philly cheesesteak with fries. It was really good. The owner was supper nice and showed gratitude for choosing there establishment. 5*s
Great food and service. Very reasonable I don't think anything was over $10. I would diffently recommend this place.
What a hidden gem! We ordered the skillets and the country fried steak was absolutely delicious. Kids eat free on week days and the prices are reasonable. We'll definitely be back for breakfast.

My wife and I visited Elys while on vacation. We purchased a Groupon and gave them a try and we were so pleased we did. We were welcomed with a kind greeting and seated promptly. Our waiter was quick to take our order and was so polite and accommodating. Our food came quickly and as ordered. I had beef fajitas which were very flavorful and my wife had one of their huge omelettes that she loved. Sadly now we have to go back to Houston and want be able to enjoy another meal at Elys. If you are in the area give them a try, you want be disappointed.
Just ordered Ely's through Uber and had a delicious pancake breakfast that came fast.  We will definitely be eating here again.
Really good tasting food! Clean & great service!! Kids eat free mon-fri! We will definitely come back!!!
Awesome incredible and highly edible.  Very nice efficient service.  Great portions.  Yea!

This place was a very good surprise!  wasn't expecting much as it was in the corner of an old strip mall, but the taco salad and chicken Philly were delicous.  They have tons of breakfast options all day too.  I always like family owned and operated too!

Fantastic food. I had the breakfast burrito with some of the tastiest chorizo I've ever had and delicious homemade guacamole, and crispy fries. The decor and atmosphere are cozy and best of all, it's cheap. A++, bring your friends :)
This place had a nice dining atmosphere.The menudo was super good if you are into that. The waitress (Karla) was sociable and fun to talk to. Overall, experience was really good.

Wonderful food and service. I judge a place on food. I got chicken omelet with square potatoes with a side of pancakes. Food was fresh and served hot. Waitress kept my water glass full of water. I would return and will during my conference here in Las Vegas. Overall think of this place as very good food at reasonable prices. Skip the glamour of the strip and eat in a mom and pop restaurant.

Nice little restaurant. I came here because of the great reviews. Not blown away by the food and service. Average for me. Nice menus with plenty of pictures. 

I had the menudo which was not really impressive. It was really bland and the tripe was not as soft as I want it. They have the sauces on the side; I guess you add the flavor yourself and adjust to your liking.     Tripe is cheap; they should not skimp out on the portions. I had corn tortillas but I was never offered a choice. Sadly, I prefer flour tortillas. I also had the junior French toast meal for a 4 year old. Not bad and priced well. Egg was cooked to order and ft he presentation was attractive. 

Service was not super good just typical. I got a refill on my coffee 3x. The food took a while to come out. I would say 20 minutes. It's an okay place I just think you the other reviews are a bit overrated but you decide for yourself.

Service was very kind. Wide variety of food selection. She got busy right after we arrived and we could've used more napkins immediately after we received our food but we didn't think to ask until she was already gone and she wasn't able to check in with us until we were almost finished because she was so busy. Don't hold it against her though. My husband had the Ely's Burger and I had the Patty Melt. Both were solid. Definitely not fine dining caliber food but if you're looking for inexpensive food that comes out quick and tastes good, come here. The server was so nice!
Better-than-average breakfast fare. Not greasy. Pancakes were fluffy. Thick bacon. Coffee was great for diner coffee. Service: top-notch.

Food is awesome. I first tried it with my men's group from my church, have been a bunch of times since. Took my family wife loves it too. Very friendly service and very prompt. Cheap prices on food as well.

Had breakfast there and it was overall good. I wouldn't say it was worth going out of our way and likely won't be back. The restaurant was very hot. I was sweating by the time we left, the staff was trying to fix but didn't know why it was so hot. If your in for a visit, there are other places worth trying before this one.

So on May/03/2018 I went to Ely's to eat and as usual Latoya was our waitress. Now, I enjoy having Latoya as our waitress she makes this restaurant worth the trip. So I had brought it up to the owners attention as to why Latoya isn't in any of there company images and the other coworkers are. The owner being a smart ass was like I'll take a picture of you and put it on our Ely page. Holding his phone he kept saying turn around Imma take your picture. Now I clearly said NO His actions were Very rude and disrespectful!!! I was just trying to have him acknowledge Latoya for the hard worker she is. Because of the owners disrespectful remark I will no longer dine here. Nor, will I be recommending this place to anyone.

The breakfast Mexican Burrito was an awesome mix of avocado, cheese, potato and more. I've never had a better breakfast burrito. The service was cheerful and quick. The only thing keeping this place from a five was that the hash browns reminded me of the leftover rinds from an egg pane: dry and hard, like uncooked ramen. So if you order the square potato bites with the Mexican breakfast burrito, you'll have a great meal.

Omg this place is awesome! We got a variety of things and they were all delicious! The cream cheese strawberry crepe was out of this world! And you can not beat the prices. Our server, Daisy, was so good! Very friendly, helpful and amazing service.

By far the greatest experience I've ever had the food was delicious cooked to my order and amazing.. Hot Fresh & Ready, the owner the staff just from the beginning to the end everything was amazing. I am very lucky to have stopped by here after grocery shopping I will continue to come here from now on... I've had many experiences with restaraunt a but this one WOW Amazing!!!

The Potato Crisp are the best thing in the world
We just ran into this place and it looked like a hole in the wall but the food was great! Especially their home made salsa! And it's really affordable and they give you a lot of food!
Food is tasty and super affordable especially weekdays. Had the 2 egg combo with strawberry banana pancakes and the serving was more than sufficient. Definitely recommend!

This place is new, and I already went 3 times  for brunch, I new about this place case the send a coupon on the mail, and yelp, cause this place is easy to miss is on the far corner of the trop and eastern shopping center (south east ) .   The decoration is is kinda simple not  to much to look around, they have an outside area but I never seen  any buddy sitting there  or really taking care of that area is just tables and chairs  not too inviting to be honest,  is a cute area with potential especially this coming moths, food was good lots of options but nothing really stand out for me until a tried the menudo, lol I was hangover ( menudo = hangover remedy ) it was really good to be honest the chile sauce was great. Service was friendly and helpful. I'll come back to this place.
Great food for the accessible prices. It looks like a family dinner. Is clean and the service is amazing.

First time here and we loved it! Great customer service and a lot of regulars come in from what I could see. Food was really good and our server JOHANA is amazing she was nice and had a smile! Definitely coming back highly recommend for sure.
Pretty good food, large portions and the price is great too. The staff is a little unprofessional but for the most part the value for the price can't beat it.

I ordered from this place via uber eats due to the popular near me feature, in the notes I asked for hashbrowns well done and they came barely cooked. The potatoes were still slightly raw and hard to eat. The eggs were nothing special just the same old scrambled eggs. The gravy from this place is more watery than it is a gravy, the country fried steak is just average. Overall less than stellar. Nothing terrible just nothing unique and or special from a flavor stand point.

We decided to try this place off the rating, I think the workers are the ones who contributed to the high rating because this place is AWFUL! From start to finish it was gross!!! There's no way this place got the ratings it did from the general public! 
Sodas were flat and when we did get them back they were still flat! My son didn't get his replaced until after his food came. 
The food, oh my..... the mozzarella sticks were cold & not cooked all the way, it was like eating half cooked bread around a piece of string cheese. The marinara sauce was runny and disgusting!
The waffle was dry, the beans on my husband's plate were runny and looked watered down, and potatoes looked frozen out of a package! 
I would not recommend this place to anyone & we will definitely stick to Omelette House next time we're in town! 
$80 for disgusting food!!!! Do yourself a favor & never come here!
Was not impressed at all. The steak tasted like rubber and pozole had no flavor and was full of grease. I felt gross after I ate here.
Nice spot, friendly clean and nice staff. Good prices also. My son had their menudo which was pretty good.  They serve decent coffee also.

Nothing great. Nothing bad. Just OK. In a crowded market such as Las Vegas, I'm not exactly sure how a place like this survives long-term. I can see it being good for families with children looking to have a fun breakfast (good pancake and French toast options, etc). But if you're hungry and looking for some good diner food, only go if your close. Prices and portions were reasonable.

Not sure why this restaurant has great reviews. I ordered through uberEATS and the food was relatively pricey for what you get. It was bland and had no flavor! I could've made it better at home. Oh well...

This place is great for a quick bite to eat. The breakfast items are my favorite, but they have great sandwiches as well. Kids eat free Monday through Friday. My son loves the chicken fingers. Definitely give this place a try.

Just happened across this wonderful gem waiting for a flight to arrive at Mc Carran.  Staff ultra friendly and the Ely burger and fries were simply great. Food arrived promptly and hot.  Tasty, tasty, tasty. Great work Ely's!

great food very friendly place in a  little shopping corner off the main  street  service very quick  hubby ordered   philly cheese steak  and i ordered chiken philly portions were huge  fries nicely seasoned   very clean    the manager weas a sweet heart very  friendly  and checking on us  will definately go back for breakfast next found a new hang out for good good food  very impressed

Must stop and eat here when in Vegas!
Stopped here for breakfast on our way home to LA since we had an early check out not to far from this place and it had great reviews and the price was right. We were not let down! It's a lil hole in the wall at a strip mall a ways away from the strip which is awesome parking wise. It's super clean and kept up. We were the only party in the restaurant  and service was a lil slow bur adequate, coffee was amazing compared to most restaurants, and our server Roberto was kind, personable and always ready to refill and bring condiments without us having having to ask. The portions and prices were great, & they have a ton of specials, not that they are even needed. The food was very flavorful, even my kids cleaned their plates! Hope this place sticks around because we will definitely be back!! Only thing we disliked was the maple flavored sausage.

I was tricked by a star rating! Oh well.  It happens every once in a while.  

Walking in I found the dining area decorated very cute and welcoming.  We had really great service from beginning to end so that was hardly any issue.  She was friendly and attentive.  

Oh man.  Here's the tough part.  My friend and I shared a few different plates.  One was the Chicken Enchilada Omelette.  Now you'd think the enchilada sauce would have an awesome full flavor.  It was very bland.  I think the waitress knew this and offered to bring out their salsas.  It maybe helped a bit but not enough to save it.  The plus side is their potatoes on the side were crisp and delicious.  They were probably the best part of the meal.  

We also shared the fruit crepes.  Again it was another disappointment.  The fruit wasn't as ripe as it should have been.  The crepes seemed soggy as if they were reheated.  0 for 2.  Bummer.  

I'm hoping they read my constructive criticism for future customers.  This diner has so much potential and I hope some improvements can be made.  Over and out.

i am what used to be called a shut-in. I cannot leave my apartment due to breathing problems, so I have to order out a lot. one of my favorite meals is pot roast. I have ordered it several times from ely's. sometimes it is good but I will usually have to "nuke" it because it is barely warm. once the veggies and potatoes were hot but the meat had been taken right put of the frige, put in the box and sent out for delivery. I live less that 2 miles from ely's so there is no excuse for cold food. this and other restaurants have got to start giving better service to delivery customers. they have to treat delivery customers like they are sitting at a table in the restaurant. most are not home bound and can go out to eat. if they are treated like this they will not patronize these establishments.
The food was ok, but not great . The avocado did not taste very good . I did not feel very comfortable , they are understaff. I'm not coming back unfortunately

Great! Delicious pancakes! Perfect eggs! Bacon cooked perfectly! Hashbrowns, toast, etc. all good! No complaints. Ordered breakfast for dinner to go and it was all superb and fairly priced! Would definitely visit again if we're in the area.
This place is so worth the money, has great service. Our waiter I don't remember his name but he was super nice, defently going back
Dang gurl! This place is good! Cheap and delicious. Plus kids eat free Monday thru Friday. If you don't mind the sketchy surroundings, but it's worth it. Yum!

Best breakfast in town me and my bf used to argue about where to eat at breakfast bc we are indecisive but now we know where, this is better than IHOP or Denny's it's delicious ! Anything on the menu is great !

Bethany E and I came in for breakfast after Ely's Restaurant was featured in a Yelp newsletter as a great brunch spot- I'm over in this area often but had never noticed the place. 

We ordered two meals to share- the chicken enchilada omelet and the fresh fruit crepes. Both arrived to the table looking nice but neither had much flavor. The enchilada sauce was pretty bland but ample sauce, chicken, and cheese were used. The crepes had fresh fruit, but the whipped cream was more like a flavorless foam and the crepe itself was an odd texture. Maybe breakfast isn't their forte.

The service was attentive and friendly throughout and the location is clean with a recently-remodeled feel. They have great low pricing and good portions, and their menu is extensive. I'll keep this spot in mind for a cheap, filling meal, but maybe scale back your expectations for flavor.

I've been to Ely's a quite of few times, and every time we come here it's the best experience we have in a restaurant period. The service, food and atmosphere is amazing. They treat you like family from the moment you walk in, to the moment you walk out especially Toya.  She reminds me of my aunt. She's the best!!! I recommend Ely's to anyone who is looking for a new restaurant to be there new go to spot. It is my spot for sure. Thank you Ely's!!!

The moment you walk in you're greeted by their wonderful hostess/waitress. She was very sweet and accommodating. I love that the owner was there to chat about his restaurant. The food is delicious with a reasonable price. I say give their place a try!

The food was good the service was great. 
I'm was pleasantly surprised by ely's chicken dinner. The chicken had a great blend of spices and the red potato mashed were wonderful. And the chicken parmigiana had a very sweet sauce and the bread was fantastic.

My wife, our son and I have lunches two days in a row. What a taste place to go in Vegas. All the hypes of famous Vegas restaurants can't beat the value nor taste that Ely's restaurant provides. Great place to go.

Went to check this place out for lunch, primarily for some posole (Mexican stew with hominy and pork). It did not disappoint. Flavorful, hearty bowl with a side plate of toppings (shredded cabbage, chopped onions, limes, chile) and tostadas. Under $10. Overheard some strangers talking to each other about how good everything is they've had here so far and could see why this place is a gem. Friendly ambiance, good portions, decent prices. I would definitely go back to try from their many plates.

I decided to eat locally since I've had really bad experiences eating at the Strip. The waitress had a nice welcoming smile when I walked in, she was very polite. 

The menu had many variety of choices and everything looked great. So I got the cheese burger and a shake. 

10-15 minutes later my food was tasty and I had no complaints at all. 

Also they were playing 1950s music, such a good throwback into old songs!

It is all right, it is the Latino version of blue berry hill. I got a menudo and the size is awesome. Portions are generous but lack of taste. As well I asked if they had grano for my menudo and the brought me the one from the pozole I could totally taste it.

I decided to try this place for the first time and ordered eggs, hash browns, and avocados... not only were there black specks all over food from a dirty stove. my avocados I ordered were rotten. :( will not ever eat here again.

After reading the reviews I decided to try this place even though some may not agree .   I stepped inside. And there were only 2 other people  there.    The place was ok . But our waitress was very friendly . The restaurant was not 100 percent clean but it was acceptable.    I ordered bacon and eggs and my friend ordered hamburger and eggs .    This was a really great breakfast . The hashbrowns which I'm not to fond of, was to die for.  The best I've had .  But the only thing that was not great was the price.  It wasn't cheap .   2 drinks 2 breakfast for 23.00.   It wasn't that expensive but I live here so I know where the great deals are . I give Elys 5 stars because of customer service and food .   The place can definitely use improvement but I will be back .

Our server Christian was friendly and efficient. I ordered the chorizo omelet with the cubed potatoes which are amazing and was happy with my order. My husband ordered the steak omelette with the hash browns and was not impressed, the steak was chewy.
Love this place. I've had the breakfast burritos and cheeseburgers and fries. Delicious and never greasy. This is my new diner. Great service and clean establishment.

First time here and was good...
Bathroom was clean and great customer service, recommend Enrique as a server..
Cozy diner with incredible food, great portions all at a reasonable price. Service was impressive and friendly. Clean bathrooms were a plus.

some really bomb food, me and my boyfriend got a groupon for this place and didnt have to pay anything extra. Price was reasonable and there was a lot of food, waitress was extremely nice, would come back next time.
Not fancy at all (we just stumbled upon it leaving Vegas), but really great Mexican breakfast with excellent service and reasonable prices.

I've been to this restaurant several times and each time I absolutely loved their food. Its such a casual dinning experience you want to make it a daily routine. There customer service is always humble and in my opinion the corner restaurant that's the perfect dinner date or breakfast brunch. 

My only issue is the booth seating because there sometimes not as soft when you sit especially when you can tell its old lumber keeping it together. 

Otherwise this place is perfect.

I came here for a brunch and took advantage of the 15 4 30 deal.  This is the real greasy spoon. I tried that eggs over easy special which was six bucks and a medium-size bowl of Menudo.

The minute it was definitely different than what I'm used to. But it was still cook really well, soft, tasty and hit the spot on a cold rainy afternoon.  The eggs were cooked perfect medium the way I liked it over easy. The hashbrowns were crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. I also asked for my bacon crispy and I was kind of odd that it wasn't crispy on the ends but Crispy be in the center.  I think the chef needs to work on his bacon frying skills and look into a bacon iron.

The total value with the deal is five stars. But I really don't think I would come back for regular price even though the specials are very reasonable. Unless I totally lose my butt and I need to get some food before I leave Vegas. Which has happened plenty of times.

This is definitely the place to come if you want a I'm broke breakfast
I really like this place it was my first time going there this weekend and I love it...our server was so polite and friendly... food tasted great!!!
An awesome local spot! Food and service was great. We will definitely make this one of our favorite Vegas spots.

This place was awesome! the service is ridiculously great and the food has that homemade taste to it. Walked in with a group on and our Server, she was excellent. Despite my order being incorrect I didn't send it back because the man that brought the food was so nice. 
I recommend the Chilaquiles with steak as a breakfast or brunch option. I have not been back but the lunch menu looked great as well. We spoke with our waitress but I didnt get her name. I know she is from california and she been here since 1999, very nice lady. 
I highly recommend this place if you are in the area or if you want to get away from all the touristy local spots.

This is our second time here. The food is delicious and is brought to you fast. The portions are huge! The customer service is A1!! Christan and Latoya are absolutely amazing. My husband order a meal that came with a ingredient he's allergic to and they quickly fixed it. This place has everything.

Went for the Menudo. Not a good choice, saw lots of other people order it. So i thought, hey, I can't go wrong if that many people like it. Wrong. Lacking flavor. I'm used to it coming with Hominy or at least them asking you if you want hominy. Nope. I added salt, lemon, oregano, chile. Nothing helped. It just wasn't for me. The home fries were really good. The server asked me twice what kind of tortillas I wanted and never brought them. I asked her the third time but I eventually NEVER got my tortillas. Left disappointed. Oh well.
First time here, Christian it's a great waiter 5 , pozole it's the best that I ever had in USA , home made taste, highly recommended this place.

Wow!! What a great place!! Menu is HUGE, so I suggest taking a look before heading over or you'll be there forever trying to decide.

We went for breakfast & it was impressive. We were seated asap.... Huevos Rancheros, Pozole, Nutella French Toast, & 2 Kids Meals (bigger than an adult portion) 4 pancakes with eggs & bacon. It was FAST, Hot, Beautiful & Delicious!! 6 people $59.00 with drinks

The only thing that was annoying, was some parent letting their kids play with the fan switch & nobody said anything. Give it a try! Their lunch & dinner selecting looks amazing too.

My experience was terrible here. The entire staff people were disrespectful and don't even reply to your "thanks." The food was not even that great as other people said here, people avoid if you can! 0 out of 10 for services and 6/10 for food.
Food was amazing I loved the chilaquiles and I really recommend the Posole whoever makes
Found this place from other Yelp reviews. Food was perfect but what made it even better was the super friendly service! I have to say I would go back just because everyone was so nice!
Delicious omelettes and iced coffees.  Our server Karla was super nice and attentive.  Definitely check it out!
Delicious pumpkin pancakes and kind owner made for a great start to the day! Clean and efficient.

Visiting from L.A., went here because of the reviews. Now, I'm just hoping my food stays down. While eating the table behind us notified the waitress of a large rat coming out of the storage room. Then, while we were finishing our breskfast, which was not very good, a large cockroach crawled out from under our table and wandered around the floor. Feeling disgusted.

Was looking for a place to grab a reasonable breakfast on the way out of town after a week in Vegas. I regret not finding this place on Day 1. It's standard breakfast fare plus some Mexican dishes (breakfast burritos, huevos rancheros, etc).  Prices were great. The place is spotless. The service was excellent. I'll be back next time I'm in Vegas!

Great food, great service. Went for my birthday and got a free meal. Had to remind waitress at checkout but she was friendly and fixed total. Small space but booths were comfy. Definitely will go again and try their menudo. Pics looked good.

Searching for something new for my coworker's and myself after a long nightshift at work brought us to Ely's restaurant.  Their exceptional food and deals led me to bring my wife and kids back the next day!  They offer breakfast, lunch, and dinner all day long and currently they offer promotions such as "Kid's eat free" and "50% off dinner entrees after 4pm".   

On our first visit, we all ordered steak and eggs.  A nice juicy steak cooked exactly to your liking paired with three eggs and potatoes and toast or chilaquiles.  Our server happened to be the owner and he explained that he named his restaurant after his daughter. Nice.  There was only one other table of customers at that time so we were waited very well.  Waters were filled promptly and various hot sauces were offered.  If you're adventurous, do try their homemade red sauce.   It's literally smoke and fire in your mouth but it's really good if you like it hot.

Our second visit was in the afternoon.  Still one or two other tables being waited on but we were always able to grab our server's attention when needed.  This time I ordered the steak fajitas taco salad, my wife had the Nutella and strawberry french toast with whipped cream, and my daughter was able to get a free kid's meal, pancakes, scrambled egg, and two pork sausage links.

All our food was spectacular.  My taco salad came with topped fresh sliced avocado and a side of ranch.  My wife and kids definitely satisfied their sweet tooth on the french toast and my daughters devoured their kid-sized pancakes.  

There are a plethora of options to choose from on their menu which include breakfast entrees, burgers, sandwiches, steaks, salads, chicken parm and more.  There's definitely something for everyone here and I highly encourage you to try this place out if you're in this side of town.

Yelp 100 Challenge 2016 - 22/100

Ordered steak and eggs. I ordered rare on purpose to see how well they know their temps, perfect. Not too many places know how to properly gage temps with meat. I of course had to send it back and cook it more but that's totally on me. Kids eat free M-F so that was a bonus. Place is great, quick and awesome service. I'll be back for the chilequiles.

Come with an appetite!  I got the ham skillet and could only eat half of it. Nice to have potatoes with seasoning. 
The staff was extremely friendly and efficient. We will definitely be back.

You know you are at home when the owners is making conversation  and checking on his customers.  Our server Ana was charming and very attending.  We enjoyed all the food we ordered.  It was all cooked to perfection and all the plates were fresh. The whole place is clean. The pozole was to die for, along with the spicy, addicting salsa it comes with. (Made by the owner's wife) the crepes were very delicious,  the chicken n waffles was oh so good. The chicken was tender and juicy, and the chilaqiles were bomb! Saucy and crunchy how I like them. The steak was soft juicy and flavorful.  I can't wait to go back because now I am hungry!!

It was absolutely delicious!! I ordered pozole and it tasted home made it hit the spot ! My daughter enjoyed their chicken fingers which were delicious and their water didn't taste like tap but fresh water definitely coming back to this place again

You are greeted immediately upon walking in!  The hostess/server was kind and inviting.  You feel very welcome here, and the atmosphere is clean. The food is good and the yelp 30 for 15 is awesome!  Just know that kids eat free Monday thru Friday unless you use the yelp coupon.

Overall a good place with excellent customer service! :)

I am a very hard person to feed when I travel. We were lucky to find this place. Everything was cooked exactly to order. Very reasonable prices & friendly staff. FOOD WAS DELICIOUS!! Definitely recommend!!

Food was good. Fair priced. Waitress was really nice. Always kept checking on me if I needed anything. Very satisfied on customer service. Small place I never knew existed until today. Keep up the good work guys!

Ordered the pazole. Bomb.com! They hot sauce that comes on the side was the best! Had to take some home it was literally burning my mouth but I enjoyed every sweating second of it. If they had beer here I'd prob give them a 5... but really can't say anything negative. I'll be back for sure.

I love this place ! One of the few spots my parents and I like to go eat breakfast. Service is excellent everyone is so nice since you walk in. We've tried different dishes and they never seem to disappoint! My mom loves the pozole !! :)

Just enjoyed a fabulous breakfast at Ely's.  My brother and I both had huevos rancheros and it was fantastic.  The serving size was so generous, I couldn't finish my meal.  Our server (sorry, don't know his name) was extremely pleasant; the music (mostly 60's) was great; and the price was right.  I definitely recommend Ely's.

I had a very pleasant service by our waitress . she had a lovely smile and was very helpful I will truly come again and hope that Karla is our waiter. The food was delicious and the environment was very calm

Mine and my daughters favorite spot. Right around the corner from my house, it's so convenient. Started coming here when it was a little slower with a much smaller menu, and have watched it grow to be such a popular family spot. We come here often and we will keep coming back. Thanks guys! Oh and awesome staff!!

Well, I order from them via Uber Eats and food was ok. So, I decided to go in. I was in the lobby, during the dinner hours, for 10 min. and was never addressed!! 10 min? I ended up walking out. It was the most bizarre thing I had ever seen.
I've been here many times. Today was the first time I was so disappointed. The beans had no flavor the rice was mushy and no flavor.  I think there is a new cook that we do not care for.
Not only is the food absolutely fabulous but the service is the best in town. Everybody has a smile on their face and is happy to be working here. Owner is awesome! Check it out.

We went for a late breakfast on Easter Sunday. The place was packed. At first glance it looks like a Mexican restaurant, but the menu includes much more than great Mexican food. We ordered the breakfast special which is a full egg and meat breakfast with a side of Crepes or waffles. The Crepes were especially good. Our waitress Anna was so fun. This is great value for the money and of course great food!

I was in the area for an appointment and had a craving for waffles. Ely's hit the mark- waffles came hot with softened butter. My over easy egg was cooked just right and the coffee was good too. My server Ron was very efficient and personable- pointed out special dishes served on the weekends-menudo and pozole. Several patrons were enjoying these dishes this morning and seemed to be enjoying them. 
This new restaurant appears clean and well organized.
Food was amazing. We where looking for a bfast lunch place outside the strip. Christian's customer service was above and beyond.

2 stars-only because all our food came out cold or luke-warm. big pet-peeve of mine. Excellent service though/waitress. all employees Mexican and very nice. nothings really low-priced... all entrees start @ 9.95 and up.

ELY'S

Came here for breakfast on our first day in Vegas and returned 3 days later.  Boy were we pleasantly surprised.  This little storefront restaurant is amazing.  For breakfast the first time, my husband and I both ordered different omelettes; not only were they enormous but filled with the choices we made.  On the second visit, we decided to try something different.  My husband ordered the 3 egg combo breakfast which included 6 slices of bacon, a choice of potatoes and choice of toast or an English Muffin.  The ice coffee is without a doubt the best I have ever had.  Anyone who knows me can tell you that I am very picky about Ice Coffee.  Our servers were phenomenal.  They were pleasant, knowledgeable and attentive.  Do yourself a favor and give Ely's a try.  You will be glad you did!

Hmmm.  This is kinda mixed.... i beleive get here after 9:30 am and all will be better.  Teamwork in the kitchen than.  So steak and eggs hash browns wheat toast for me.   Not over the top but edible.. 1st child.  Waffles and bacon.. he is a fan.... breakfast sandwich for mother.  Looked amazing came with potatos they were.   Small child.  Crepe( perhaps) trim menu to specialties as first crepes are not one that needs to be there... quality food overall, clean atmosphere... owner nice guy came up to the table... wait staff nice family style ...also had Pozole.   Shucks.  A little thin... like the sides that came with it though
Great access, quick and friendly service. Good food and quick. Thank you Johana for your smile and  heart.
Our waitress was very nice! Brought us drinks before we even needed our refill and he food was amazing. You should definitely try them out.

The first two words in their Yelp description is "fresh food", but my order was anything but. My order is simple - a strawberry banana French toast delivery. Cut up, juicy fruits on top of a lightly fried bread - simple right?

What blows my mind is how they used canned??? strawberries. I'm not from Vegas, but I'm hoping fresh fruit isn't that hard to find where restaurants forgo it. They have a preservative taste that once biting into, makes you think that these strawberry slices have been sitting in a plastic container somewhere for a couple of weeks. 

Then... the BANANAS. The bananas are blackish and gummy. Blackish and GUMMY!!! Who uses those words to describe bananas??? These bananas literally look like they mummified before being delivered to me....

And the piece de l'resistance is the French toast. Oh boy. You know the texture of stale bread is like? It rips a certain way, it's fluffy, flavorless, and dry all at the same time? That's this French toast. 

Unfortunately, this entire order reminded me of those questionably "healthy" cafeteria breakfasts from high school, slapped together by pissy lunch ladies, but worse. A lot worse.

Good food. Cute place with old town -diner feel. Prices are not bad. If I were to give a critique it would be: consientiousness of server is a little lacking.  My water glass had been empty for most my meal. My girlfriends coffee hasn't been topped off yet and our meal is almost over.

I had the pleasure of being the very first customer at this diner. Had the bacon and cheese omelette that was loaded with bacon!  Excellent coffee as well and a very attentive staff. The menu offers many of the standard diner items and next time I'll be trying the pancakes. They serve a variety of breakfast sandwiches and breakfast burritos as well. They offer homemade red and green salsa and the option to create your own breakfast sandwich. There's also a kids menu selection for the little ones.  Very reasonable prices with a number of specials. 

They've done a great job renovating the space (a former sushi bar) and it's very clean and inviting. I wish them good luck at this location. They open at 6:00 am so this is the perfect spot for early risers. 

If you're visiting from out of town this is not too far from the strip and definitely worth the taxi fare.

This place has great affordable food. I been here with my husband a couple of times & they haven't disappointed us! It's a nice cozy restaurant & all the staff is super friendly. & it's only minutes from home, we'll be coming here more often :)
Staff was friendly, food took a while to come out but it was worth the wait. I had the Nuttela crepes and a skillet

Didn't even try the food.  The tables were dirty,  all of them.  I let that go, but then the glass I got for water had a big fat greasy handprint on it.  I could almost let that go, but the server acted like I was crazy for mentioning it and didn't even offer to grab a new one.  She was polite, but I would rather feel safe about what I'm eating than have someone who is nice but dirty.

The combo breakfast, incl the basic 2 eggs & choice of 4 pieces of sausage or bacon and something for my sweet tooth for $10.99. Good price for an average portion of breakfast, the crepes were folded instead of rolled and skimpy on the nutella and strawberries.
Good prices, great food. There breakfast selections are the best. Brunch? Even better. For the quality and especially the amount you get, you'll definitely feel well worth it!

My husband & I have been going to Ely's for a while now....sad to say we won't be going back. I had an awful expirence with the server Erica who had the nerve to call me out & ask me why I was giving her attitude. 
From the get go I think Erica was having a bad day & maybe she just took her frustration out on her unfriendly shallow attitude.
I politely asked her if possible could the a.c. be turned up because it was a Sunday morning & it felt so warm & stuffy inside, she said she would check...
 She got my order wrong
Then when my food was remade I guess the cooks remade it so fast that they forgot to add avocado to my burrito. Not to mention she didn't bring my husband's toast & worst of all we asked for an ice tea refill & my husband told her I'd like a refill but I'm not done with this one yet....he told her about 3 times but Erica still wanted to take my husband's drink away. I don't know why she didn't want to let my husband finish his drink....
By this time as any normal person might feel I was beyond frustrated & saddened by the awful service & the way we were being treated.
Although I told Erica "ummmmm hello don't take his ice tea" She then told me Is there a reason why you have attitude with me? I was shocked she asked me that because all she had to do was apologize instead she confronted me which took a lot of balls to do!
I admit My reaction wasn't the best but for the way she was acting with us was unexcuseable. The manager came over & apologized for Ericas poor service & comped my meal. 
My husband & I go to Elys all the time the waitress Veronica always took care of us with such great care. Because of the gossip that Erica obviously told everyone including her friend Veronica who my husband & I gratefully admired & became somewhat close acquaintances with has stopped talking to me & she deleted me off of her social media accounts. Which is very sad how Veronica took sides & my husband & I as costumers will never ever go back to Elys again. Very very sad situation lost a friend & costumers forever

My husband and I went to Ely's for dinner last night. I ordered the Chorizo & Jalapeno burrito and my husband ordered the Steak Fajita Salad. BOTH were delicious! My burrito was ordered "wet" and the red sauce was soooooo good!! The burrito was a very generous size accompanied by your choice of potato. I ordered the fresh potato chips. My husband said the Taco salad was one of the best he has ever had. Greens were very fresh, generous portions of meat and very flavorful. 

The service was great and the prices were very reasonable! We will definitely go back to Ely's! We will also bring friend & family and spread the word! We can't wait to go back and try out other dishes!

This place is the pits.  We came in with 12 people and never got served.  The waiter took the order and never placed the order in the kitchen.  Understaffed and poorly managed!  Don't come in with a big group!!!!  Too bad I can't give them a negative rating!!!

Great food when we came in for breakfast. Roberto was extremely friendly to the family and there were so many great food choices on the menu. My Chicken Enchilada omlette had so much chicken it was shocking. Will come back!

Food is great server was little lost.  Dint know what to recommend. And we ask what u will eat here and server replied.  Lol I will eat meatball and spaghetti but don't worried I don't think u will eat thatI have never had that respond anywhere before. One for the book. Lol.   So I guess they don't recommend the food here lol anyways I believe my food was great good flavor and great taste

This place was awesome. I found it via Yelp and I was not disappointed. To our surprise all 3 of our kids ate free and the food was great! Our waitress Karla was friendly and attentive. I strongly recommend.

This place was pretty good. The decor is definitely outdated but the server was really great. She was attentive and helpful. The food was pretty good. I would recommend this place and will probably be back.

Ordered build your own omelette and strawberry bananas waffle. Omelette was a good size with good amount of toppings. Waffle had a good taste but banana were missing from order. Hash browns were dry and tasted a little freeze dried. Will order again :)

7/10/2017  Went to Ely's to use up a Groupon Coupon I purchased a couple of months ago.  I was seated and after telling the waitress that I had a Groupon she said she had to speak to the manager about it.  The manager came out and said that I was required to order two entrees because Groupon was the one making all the money and my order for a single Chicken Fried Steak and fries with a Coke wouldn't be honored because I had ordered a single entree, and it's required that I order 2 entrees.   I said OK, I'll order a cheeseburger to go.  They then accepted the coupon.  I do not understand the concept but it is what it is.  I don't think I'll do business with either Ely's or Groupon in the future.  The concept of buying a coupon in advance to save money is one thing.  For it to be an issue when trying to redeem the coupon is not worth the savings.  This is posted for those that may want to avoid an unnecessary confrontation in redeeming the Groupon Coupon.
I had the huevo rancheros. Really good! Crispy tortilla, pleasant red sauce and very good rice. It was a slow to. E when I visited, 4:30, and service was exceptional. Food arrived quickly.

Just got here, ordered fettuccine Alfredo, eagerly awaiting the food based on the pictured menu 
Super cute diner! The color scheme is Browns with cute white painted Deco. I am really digging this place so far. Not busy. 

Oh my gosh!!! The food is DELICIOUS!!! I am so completely surprised at how amazing it is. The fettuccine has a lovely array of veggies, grilled to perfection chicken strips and is served parses an crusted dinner toast. Delightful!!! And, delectable!

I will definitely be back!!! And, soon.

This place is a secret for some reason but I cannot imagine it is going to be that way for long. Even the ranch dressing on the salad was savory and yummy.

Clap Clap Clap amazing simply amazing, they did it again. It's always a pleasure coming to this restaurant they always treat you like royalty, especially when you're considered a regular. Christian our server was absolutely phenomenal, he kept making sure my friend and I was good and was interactive. He made sure we had smiles on our faces the whole time. I recommend this place for any type of event.

Great service here. They were very busy but very attentive. I ordered a complex mix of breakfast items and they nailed it. They are going to put the Denny's on the corner out of business with the homestyle feel and clean/fast service with quality food.

WOW food was AMAZING. Staff was nice and friendly. Highly recommended. It's really nice inside. I LOVE that they have pictures of the food in the menu. Good prices and good portions. I had the Pozole I got the big plate and didn't wants to share. My boyfriend got the New York steak skillet I tried his too. Omg it was good. Everything looks so AMAZING I DIDNT KNOW WHAT TO GET. We will definitely be back most likely every Sunday since it's my only day off. I know this business will do great.

YOU SHOULD DEFINITELY GIVE THEM A CHANCE 

THANK YOU. YOUR FOOD WAS AMAZING

Great food!

This restaurant isn't located on the Strip... this place isn't Hash House A Go Go, Momofuku, Wicked Spoon nor is it Eggslut (although I've bookmarked those places for future visits) but because of that it doesn't have the food prices you pay when dining at the Strip. Get it? For a little over $20 we were able to fill our tummies with delicious food.

I had Ely's Burger. Beef, cheese, grilled onions, mushrooms, lettuce, tomato and mayo... hold the pickles and red onion, please. The meal came with crinkle-cut fries. I love the mushrooms in this burger. Tasty and delicious!  Hubby had the Bacon (or Sausage) Skillet. He scarfed it down... no need to ask him if he enjoyed his meal. 

This place has a casual dining atmosphere, nothing fancy. They serve classic American food, breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Great, affordable prices. Our table was well taken care of. Very attentive servers but not overly. They were friendly and nice. Hubby loves wearing his GS Warriors shirts and it always gets attention from sports fans when we go places. Had engaged in a convo with the server who also processed our bill (Lakers fan). Then, I'm not sure if it was the owner that said to me as we were leaving... "review us in Yelp" (now how did he know I Yelp??). Worth coming back to when we're in town again :)

Review #0835

Good burritos. Huge burritos. You can custom make your own burrito. Ordered through UberEATS , huge mistake but finally food was delivered. I would eat here again but actually dine in the restaurant. OJ was ok , a little watery .. definitely would not order the juice again.

I've ordered 2 times food from here and I can say wow. The portions are better than other places and the food is always delicious!!! The avocado omelette is amazing! I haven't gone to eat at the restaurant but maybe I will next weekend.

Came here twice for breakfast while visiting Las Vegas, and thoroughly enjoyed both visits.  The breakfast choices are amazing, as is the food itself.  And the servers have been attentive, polite and efficient.  This restaurant is located in the corner of a strip mall, but worth the search.  It is plain and simple, which is the reason for not giving it five stars, but give it a try and you'll come away full and happy.
Had a Chef Salad which was very fresh and a veggie omelette which was also fresh and big. Veggies were crisp and not over cooked! Service was great and the restaurant was clean!

I thought I reviewed this place already but yelp shows I have not , I originally came to this restaurant around the time they opened and had breakfast, an omelette I believe and it was great. on this visit I of course had breakfast for lunch again !! Oh me!! Lol 
I ordered  the meat skillet which includes 4 pieces of either bacon or sausage I asked for half and half which the server happily agreed to, it also includes deep fried potato chunks, cheese , peppers, onions, choice of toast and of course 2 eggs cooked to order. 
Food came out rather quick as there really wasn't that many customers inside , I was 1 of 3 tables, the food although plain looking tasted great , the eggs were cooked a perfect over medium , the potatoes crisp and piping hot , the bacon a perfect crispness ( and tasty ) , the sausage equally as good , my only beef with the meal was the peppers and onions were a little over done and limp ( maybe pre cooked ?) and the cheese was sparse and barely melted, which I don't know how because food was hot , ( obviously bagged and maybe not natural ) I see that in a lot of casino type cafe places as a way to keep costs down , but when you are serving a good product the ingredients should be up to par as well ( that's my opinion) but all in all I definitely would be back maybe to try one of their burgers next time and all in all for 8.99$ it is a great deal and I left full !!
Ordered for delivery through Eat24. Food arrived promptly and well packaged. Portions were larger than expected and the food was delicious.
Don't know why i don't eat here waaaay more often. Reallhy good food, healthy portions,very fair pricing. I recommend totally.

Driving by on our way to Hoover Dam, great food and friendly staff, very clean place and the staff was very attentive and asking if we need anything and the food came out was a was great everything was delicious and the portions were enough.

The green chilaquiles were superb the green sauce vas delicious.

We had the pozole and green chilaquiles. The food was tasty and home style like. At first we were hesitant on trying the Mexican dishes because we afraid they'd be inauthentic, but they were quite the contrary.
Johana was very friendly and attentive. She even offered to have us meet the owners. Told us a little bit about the restaurant history. 
Food was servers reasonably fast. 
The place was cozy and clean and perfect for families.
The prices were very reasonable and I would definitely come back.

The manager was very friendly and I had a hard time choosing what to eat! Everything looked so so inviting! I got the triple burger and it was so good! The prices are fair for what you get! Try them out! Support your local businesses!

Great breakfast specials and super friendly staff. 

I went here with a friend and was blown away by the breakfast special. Great bang for your buck. The strawberry cream crepes and waffles are to die for!!! I've been back 3-4 times since my first visit last weekend.

Food is ok. But the service is not as good. Waited long for my water and they ignored you cuz they all busy talking and gossiping maybe . They talk spanish so dont really know what they're talking about. Wont recommend at all. But atleast i tried right

This place is just ok. I didn't have a bad experience just mediocre. Nothing special here. I was expecting greatness from all the reviews but was disappointed. I came here with my aunt who is elderly and she really enjoys it because it's so quiet and calm inside the restaurant.

I'm sure most likely this restaurant usually gives excellent service, but on today when coming in to pick up a pre-ordered three meat burrito with hash browns it took me close to 40 minutes to get the order. Three or four people came in after me with carry-out orders and got theirs before I had enough waiting and mention something to one of the managers. And two or three minutes later I got my order of the one burrito. Not a good first impression hoping that future visits will be much better

Ron the 'Owner' is very rude.  I asked to be seated outside he said yes one moment I said no problem.  As he seats me, he asked me how I'm paying today? First of all you think you could ask if i wanted something to drink first.  I told him a Groupon and proceeds to tell me i need to buy two entrees. Im by myself i don't need to buy two entrees for the Groupon. Very bad first impression I don't recommend this restaurant especially after dealing with an owner that works the front and is that rude.

First time here this morning, it was pretty dead aside from us and maybe two other tables. My boyfriend ordered the 3 meat burrito 'wet' and I ordered scrambled eggs, bacon, and French toast. The French toast wasn't very warm and was really hard to cut through. It was like they made the French toast first and then made everything else so it sat out for a while. Eggs were good, bacon was thick and delicious. Boyfriend said his burrito "wasn't spectacular" but still liked it enough to finish 3/4ths of it. Overall this place was ok, I don't think I enjoyed it enough to come back. I'd rather go to IHOP, it was pretty much the same food. Their music was also pretty distracting, it was a bunch of old 70s and 80s music.

My kids were very happy to have breakfast for dinner. The strawberry cream cheese crepes were delicious. I'm always rooting for the small business owner, over big chain restaurants. I hope this restaurant remains a staple in our neighborhood. I will come back. Just a small reminder, be kind and patient with your server, he was the only one staffed. He worked hard for the money.
We've been here 5/6 times in the past few months. We love the posole. A little slow on the service, but never bad service. Would recommend

Portion sizes are huge. Well worth the money. We all got their pancakes with strawberries and cream and while delicious the strawberries were kinda sad looking. Staff was friendly and when we asked for over easy eggs we got over easy eggs which was nice.

Experience: We were in the area and looking for a place to eat. Looked on YELP, and this place has good reviews, so we stopped. It was 1:00 on a Monday. 

Facility: This a nice spot, located in a strip mall.  It has a small diner feel, and it's nice and clean. There are tables and chairs and booth seating. 

Service:  we were greeted and sat immediately. The waitress got our drinks immediately, but there was a bit of a delay coming back to take our order. The waitress was still very friendly. 

Food:  I ordered the Avocado BLT and they both got the chicken fajita salads in the taco salad bowls. 
The BLT was delicious!  The bacon was cooked perfectly.

I would come again.

I ordered the green chilaquiles. They arrived and they were just tortillas in green sauce. The worst. Anytime I have ever ordered them they came with eggs. Skip them from this place , do yourself a favor and go to Blueberryhill and flamingo 100% better. Oh they will give you an egg if you pay a dollar extra.

I ordered the New York Steak Breakfast through UberEats. It was so delicious. I ordered it medium rare and it was PERFECT as well as the eggs which I ordered over medium. The potatoes were also tasty!
I've come here twice so far and have been very happy so far.  Their waiters are always very kind and eager to please and the food is wonderful.  One of my favorite places in Vegas so far!
The food was very good. The service was very friendly and fast. The prices were excellent! Very nice breakfast specials as well. The only issue I had was they were out of wheat bread. Oh my!
Came in for father's day , first timers . Great service and food.  Ordered the French toast with vanilla ice cream.
Hey Guys it a must to have breakfast place awesome services from Toya fast and amazing food for a weekday early morning. Thanks so much guys for making my day start great
At work we order alot of food, we went threw ubereats. Anyway had the pozole and it was amazing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Absolutely amazing food and service. Clean establishment, and very friendly staff. This is a hidden gem!
Great food.  Incredibly welcoming and friendly staff.  Stopped by trying to find chilaquiles close to school and they were so good!  Would definitely come back.

We wanted a brunch place as we had just flown in from the East coast and we were ready for lunch, but no one was serving yet.  We totally lucked into Ely's - which was a great experience.  Not a fancy place, but clean and friendly.  
 We noted several tables with people who were obviously "regulars".  I sometimes worry that places like this won't be happy with tourists. Not so.  We were welcomed warmly and the waitress offered to explain anything on the menu.  Not necessary.  I saw Huevos Rancheros and my husband the Ely's skillet with Chorizo, and we were ready.  Our son got the chicken finger. When I saw the plates, I said,"Oh my. What are we going to do with all this food?  I will be eating this for dinner!".  Um. No.   We all ate every bit. It was all very fresh and the make their own salsa. Great Stuff!  I don't know what brand of ranch dressing they use, but it was so good, I asked if they make that on site also (they don't).
I so wanted to try dessert, but could not eat another bite.  We will be back.

Early morning trip downtown. Found this place in a strip mall Eastern n Tropicana.  Great prices and food very good. Nice menu I saw several items but settled on sausage and eggs.  Owner gave me a sample of home made salsa it was very nice. I will try one of there many omelettes. Next time.

Saturday morning was fight day in Vegas so we were looking for a breakfast spot off the strip to avoid long lines and a lot of people. While driving down Tropicana we found a small place called Ely's. We decided to give it a try because it got 4 stars on google reviews. I am SO GLAD we did. The food was amazing. My husband ordered steak and eggs and he was not disappointed. I ordered chorizo and eggs with hash browns and it was amazing. We also split a big bowl of pozole for our hungover morning, best decision ever. It was made perfectly, right portion and right price. We left full and very satisfied. I already recommended this place to all my friends when looking for a good breakfast spot off the strip. The staff was very friendly and attentive as well. You will not be disappointed when you give this place a try.
Great food amazing service and impressive portion sizes. Place is a bit of a hole-in-the-wall but it's clean. I'd definitely eat here again!
Food wasn't great, the hash browns soft and the bacon not cooked all the way. Plus the waiter was clearly confused as he delivered food without utensils and by the time we got utensils it was cokd

Wow... definitely a place to come to when in Vegas! All the staff are super nice and attentive, our waitress was amazing! Thank you to all the staff at Ely's Restaurant for the amazing hospitality. We shall see you as soon as we come visit Vegas again!

Steak fajitas were too tough to chew. They served my dinner before my salad. It got cold. Three slices of tomato with the canned frijoles and overcooked rice. Tasteless. Worst fajitas ever. Server was overwhelmed. Only two dressings available. No oil and vinegar. Can't and won't return. Maybe not for huerdos. People seemed to enjoy menudo with pozole. Cheeseburger was okay. Food is overpriced. Maybe breakfast is better. Could not be worse.

While in LV my hubby and I decided to get off the beaten path and use Yelp to find a breakfast place. We decided on Ely's. We had a fabulous meal. My husband had the breakfast burrito. I had the chicken fried steak, eggs and hash browns. Neither one of us could finish it. It was also very reasonably priced. The staff was very friendly. Highly recommend this place. It's only a few miles from the LV strip.

This is my second review for Ely's; but, this time I've got pics!!!!!
Ely's is offering buy one, get one free after 4pm. That alone is fantastic. My fear is that they are offering it because they are not doing well. We lose too many good local places. It's a passion of mine to support local places, when they deserve it. Ely's does.
Last night, I had the tilipia cooked in spinach, mushroom, and alfredo sauce. My husband had the bbq chicken and shrimp. Both were delicious. My husband and I are rather talented in the kitchen, so eating out can be a mixed experience. I'm always excited when I have a dish that is not something I could make better. (I know, now I seem obnoxious and conceited. I promise I'm not. I'm actually kinda cute and sweet.)
Both of our dishes were lovely with excellent portion sizes. It's just the entree, no soup or salad. They do offer a nice appetizer menu. They also offer a lot of sweets for desserts. Twice now, I haven't had room for one of their crepe or stuffed french toast offerings. My body and I had words about it!!! The pictures look yummy and more than a bit decadent. Definitely something to try.
I do always try to include information for those of us concerned with mobility, seating, and access. If you don't struggle with mobility and size concerns, please feel free to go back to the part about the desserts. If bathrooms and seating keep you out of restaurants, you will appreciate this. The chairs are sturdy and without arms. There are mostly booths; but, I've not had to wait for a table. I was VERY pleased with the ladies restroom. It is wide enough for a walker or other device. The door is not super heavy; which can be quite a struggle when you're managing a walker. When will "they" design doors that are reachable, light enough to open with one hand, and don't swing into you? Ok, that's a soap box for another time! Ely's door is less difficult than most and they have amble space on either side of the commode, plus 2 rails!!! The commode is a bit low, but there are 2 rails, so no problem. 2 rails and space!!!
Service was wonderful. It has been both times. Our server treated us like a regular on our second visit. She's attentive, personable, and seems genuinely interested in your having a good time. There's no pressure to turn over the table or push to order more.
I hope we can keep this local gem going strong. Check out the buy one, get one after 4pm!

We are at Ely's on a Sunday morning.  They were very busy which is always a good sign in my book. Service was fast and friendly. Food arrived quickly and was very tasty. I also had strawberry lemonade that was great.

My family and I ate at Ely's Restaurant for the first time today. I had the Posole which was cooked to perfection. My husband had to Philly Cheese steak sandwich. He said it was delicious. I ordered my son the cheese burger and he loved it. The staff was very attentive and made time to get to know us. There is a variety of food to choose from that the whole family could enjoy. We will be going back on Sunday morning to try the breakfast.
The food is incredible and service is great!! There's a lot of dishes I can't wait to try. I've always been satisfied at Ely's!!

Great food!! Great Service!! Great Specials!!! 

If you can't tell, it's GREAT!!!! 

The best inexpensive food you can get! Better than Denny's, IHOP, or any other diners!

Top of my list with a breakfast spot ... Came in and got seated quickly ...our food came out hot and within minutes ! Came in on a Friday and our waiter offered us pozole let me say that was a great choice !!!!! Who ever makes the pozole is a goddess lol ... I also ordered the red chilquiles with eggs and beans ! Everything tasted so home made felt like I was at home eating at my house ! Thank You Ely's I will definitely be back !!!!

Just ordered some food via Amazon app, I order a Philly cheese steak, it would have been great, if it had included more than a spoonful of meat, as it was, it ended up being a grilled cheese and mushroom sandwich with a garnish of steak

Excellent service and wonderful food! Johanna was so mamazing and pleasant. She guided us and was so patient with helping us with food selections. This was just what we needed and Johanna made sure we had an exceptional experience at Elys. We suggest the philly cheese steak and fries, that was great! My husband had the mega cheeseburger with the curly fries ( this was the beat curly fries I've had). Excellent place and excellent service!
Found this place on Uber Eats and it's really good! Low prices and quality food! It sucks I can't find them on Uber Eats or any delivery site anymore.

This place is a great home style eats. 
Pros
1. Clean
2 happy server
3. Big portions
4. Three meat burrito was well cooked with ham, bacon, sausage, eggs, and potatoes. I couldn't ask for anything more. It was well seasoned with potatoes they were great too I wish i could have eaten them all. 
5. Meat lovers omelet was cooked perfectly with bacon, ham, chorizo, and cheese. It also cam with a side of potatoes. It was all a meat lover could ask for. 
6. Cheesecake..... mmm it looks amazing but we have yet to try it since our meals were so filling and hard to stop eating. 
Cons
1. We ordered a blueberry shake and side of pancakes that never came. But it worked out ok since we already had more than enough food. 

Over all I am happy we found this place!! Cant wait to be back!

Found this place from a search for nearby breakfast. It's small, unassuming and out of the way, but don't let that fool you. Our server Erika was pleasant, attentive and working the 8 tables by herself like a champ. Prices were reasonable and the food was phenomenal. I would recommended this to anybody and their friends or family. We will definitely be coming back to Ely's!!

Good option for off the strip diner food. Stopped in today before our flight home for take out breakfast burritos. Tried calling in to order ahead but was left on hold for at least 5 min. Not sure what happened there but when we arrived the place was pretty empty. Ordered food quickly and it was ready in about 10-15min. Burritos were huge and served with hash browns. Perfect pre flight meal!!

Solo para un consejo 
Hace unos das desayunamos ah,
No chips
No salsa
No bueno..!
Ordene steak and chilaquiles 
Y el steak estaba muy inspido y simple, los frijoles que ped, estaban secos, un poco de manteca de puerco lo arreglara, arroz, tena muchsimo ajo, las tortillas ms grandes que el plato..
Las crespas de Nutella saba mucho a aceite .!
No har este mensaje pblico, pero por favor estos detalles lo separan de un restaurante con xito
Le deseo lo mejor..!
Mensaje sin respuesta, 
Pues aqu tendr tiempo de verlo..

My husband and I found this place on Groupon after we first moved to vegas and we love it! They have the best breakfast and serve it all day! If you wanna splurge order the caramel banana French toast with ice cream! It's bomb!

Wonderful breakfast! More than I could eat, which is unusual! The waitress/cashier lady was very nice. More people should eat here. My only complaint is they don't have biscuits and gravy! We will be back!!
We used a Restaurant.com coupon here, and were pleased with our meal. Daisy gave us very good service, too. We will return soon!

Excellent service.  Excellent food.  We found Ely's just a short drive off the Strip. 
Our waitress,Ana, helped us decide from many delicious choices. If you're looking for a slightly quieter dining experience, this is it. :)
After charging so much extra for avocado they should at least make sure is fresh. I am disgusted, never ordering from here again.

We came in for a late lunch with Yelp $15/$30 deal. We'd been shopping at the outlets. 

We tried the chicken strips kids meal, with juicy chicken and great fries. We tried the posole which was spicy and wonderful and the chicken was super tender. When she asked for more meat they brought a bowl with meat and hominy.

We tried the omelette with ham and avocado and cottage fries which were just OK. 

The service was friendly and attentive. The drinks were refilled regularly. Tried the pineapple lemonade and it was tart and refreshing. Had a piece of cheesecake and they brought it out with the huge presentation of chocolate sauce, canned strawberries and whipped cream.

The food was great and we only went six dollars over bill so for the three of us we ate lunch for less than $30, including tip.

Gotta say, I'm pretty impressed with the little hole in the wall.  Found a great deal on groupon and since my kids couldn't agree on a specific type of food this was perfect for a nice variety of breakfast, Mexican, burgers etc.  the chips and guacamole were fantastic!  The burgers are huge!!  The kids meals are even large portions.  They didn't finish everything.  Clean and friendly but the food was a little slow coming out.  Not great for a hurry up meal.  But would definitely go back!

The food here is super good. Every time I've gone the staff has been extremely friendly and we are seated right away. It may seem like a hole in the wall for dinner, but it's worth a try! Their homemade chips are to die for, and they serve very healthy portions.

Kick ass food, great meal for the budget. I must say it's really good. That's as far as it goes cause with the service, it miss the mark with that. I came for breakfast and I got ignored, the place was empty with just 2 other patrons. She kept calling me "baby" for whatever reason. I even got my check without even asking for it right in the middle of my meal and to me it's like hurry up, eat and get the F' out. It's fine, if  and when I do return, just gotta make sure it's someone else waitressing ..   :(

Better time now the staff was nice no midrare ok  the are precooked most likely still a great deal on generic food 
Tables still full of dirty dishes for a wille  after costumers are gone.

I'm a regular at this local pops&moms restaurant, and I absolutely love it! The service, the food, and the prices are all perfect to come eat at any time, top favorites are the stake w/ chilaquiles sub of rice & beans and the pozole. Will keep coming!
We were looking for a place off the strip & lucked into Ely's. Our server was attentive but not overbearing. The breakfast was large portions but delicious. My husband raved about the pozole.
Great place with excellent service from our waitress Karla. Would highly recommend. Came for breakfast, would come again on our trip to Vegas.

I was in Las Vegas on a guys trip and had a long night if you know what I mean . The next morning sorry later that morning we were craving some good breakfast food. I searched Yelp and found Elys. Let's just say the food was so good we kept coming back. The service and food was awesome (5-stars).

We took our three boys and a friend to Ely's on a Sunday morning. We were seated right away. It took a little to get drink orders in and received but once we got moving, service was good. Very nice staff. The menu has a great mix of breakfast items and are reasonably priced. The kids menu is good and offers a variety of options for my picky eater. I had the veggie omelet. Although it is filled with a frozen veggie mix--it was delicious. Everyone was happy with their selections. Since its near my office, we'll be back for dinner soon.

Very impressed!  Found Ely's on Uber Eats and was dying for breakfast.  Ordered a build your own breakfast burrito and the waffles with strawberry/banana.  Both were VERY good.  Burrito wasn't greasy or soggy like most are after delivery and the waffles were made with real waffle batter.  5 stars for sure!

The food is amazing here. We were just visiting Vegas for a couple days and ended up having breakfast here both mornings. Johana was our server, she was so polite and friendly. She made us feel welcome both times. Great hospitality and great food.
